name: Plankton community in WP2 net (200Âµm), Point B, Villefranche-sur-Mer, France
description: This series is part of the long term planktonicmonitoring of Villefranche-sur-mer, which is one of theoldest and richest in the world. It aimsat describing the dynamics of the mesozooplankton community. The data collection and processing has beenfunded by several projectsover its lifetime. It is currently supported directly by the Institut de la MerdeVillefranche (IMEV), as part of its long term monitoring effort. This dataset contains the planktonicorganisms collected by a WP2net (200Î¼m mesh) and therefore coverorganisms from 200Âµm to~2cm.
